sentence.Network_en: That her machinations to marry off her daughters all work out?
sentence.Network_cn: 她千方百计希望自己的姑娘们有所依靠最终全部实现?

sentence.Network_en: Your friend, meanwhile, has no need of these mental machinations.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时, 你的朋友没有心理阴谋诡计的需要.

sentence.Network_en: Guri served as a diplomat - of - sorts , luring Leia into Xizor's complex machinations.
sentence.Network_cn: 西佐便派遣古丽调查莱娅在黑日的利益.

entry.def: You use machinations to describe secret and complicated plans, especially to gain power.

example.ex: ...the political machinations that brought him to power.
example.tran: 将他推上权力宝座的政治阴谋
货币套利者的阴谋诡计
